Impenetrable_Defenses.help: The spines controlling the repulsion field around Mot are effectively invincible as long as other allied forces remain nearby. Their protective shell drops, however, as soon as all support is lost.
Impenetrable_Defenses.targetHelp: The spines controlling the repulsion field around Mot are effectively invincible as long as other allied forces remain nearby. Their protective shell drops, however, as soon as all support is lost.

Frigid_Smash.help: You wind up a massive smash, striking the ground with tremendous force. This unleashes a shock wave of death energy in a cone which causes cold damage, with the lingering effect of death also dealing negative energy damage over time. Additionally, the target's defense against and resistance to cold and negative energy attacks are reduced. Finally, the longer the Sentinel remains alive, the more likely his presence will sap the target's soul, causing them to suffer increased endurance cost for all powers.
Frigid_Smash.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), Minor DMG (Cold), Minor DoT (Negative Energy), -DEF(Foe, Cold/Negative Energy), -RES(Foe, Cold/Negative Energy), Knockup(Foe), Chance for +EndCost(Foe)
Frigid_Smash.targetHelp: Your resistance against cold and negative energy attacks has been reduced, and there is the potential for your powers to cost more endurance to execute.

Additionally, the affected targets suffer from endurance drain and reduced regeneration and recovery. Finally, the longer the Sentinel remains alive, the more likely his presence will sap the target's soul, causing them to suffer increased endurance cost for all powers.

Enervating_Strike.help: Your focus on a single target gradually drains their body's ability to recover. The longer you remain focused on a single target, the worse this becomes, until they are no longer able to regenerate on their own or be healed.
Enervating_Strike.targetHelp: Your regeneration rate and healing effectiveness have been reduced. This effect will stack up to 5 times, but can be eliminated by diverting the Sentinel's attention to another target.

Frigid_Grasp.help: You freeze a single target in a mass of death energy. The target is held and suffers cold damage, as well as negative energy damage over time. Some of the drained health is returned to you, healing you. The target also suffers lingering reductions in their movement and recharge speeds after the hold ends. Finally, the longer the Sentinel remains alive, the more likely his presence will sap the target's soul, causing them to suffer increased endurance cost for all powers.
Frigid_Grasp.shortHelp: Ranged (Secondary Target), Moderate DMG(Cold), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), Grounded(Foe), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), Chance for +EndCost(Foe), Heal(Self)
Frigid_Grasp.targetHelp: You have been caught in a mass of frozen death energy and have been held. When the hold ends, you will suffer reduced movement and attack speeds. There is also the potential for your powers to cost more endurance to execute.

Voracious_Maw.help: You call upon the many mouths of Mot to emerge from the ground beneath a single target's location. Initially, smaller mouths will emerge and tear at the flesh of all targets caught in the field of effect, causing minor lethal damage. Eventually, one of the larger mouths will appear and snap shut, dealing major lethal damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} calls upon one of Mot's {PowerName}s to tear your body apart!

Deaths_Embrace.help: Diabolique exerts her influence over Mot to destroy those trapped within the creature. However, Dream Doctor managed to complete his ritual in time and will assist Incarnates in reaching her realm, where the final battle can begin.
Deaths_Embrace.targetHelp: Diabolique exerted her influence over Mot to destroy you while you were trapped within the creature. However, Dream Doctor managed to complete his ritual in time and will assist you in reaching her realm, where the final battle can begin.

Singularity.help: Using powers stolen from Dominatrix, you create a miniature gravitational well at your opponent's location, preventing your movement. The event horizon of this well grows over time, eventually capturing nearby allies who do not flee the area. At its fullest extent, the interior well erupts in a giant burst of energy, dealing significant damage to all targets caught in the field at the moment of the explosion. Recharge: Fast
Singularity.targetHelp: You have been trapped by a singularity and cannot escape!

messages.victimHit: Diabolique creates a {PlayerSource} at your location!

MawMaster.help: You call upon the many mouths of Mot to emerge from the ground beneath a single target's location. Initially, smaller mouths will emerge and tear at the flesh of all targets caught in the field of effect, causing minor lethal damage. Eventually, one of the larger mouths will appear and snap shut, dealing major lethal damage.
